Description.Name: LB 10-X AC APFSDS Ammo
Description.Details: Armor Piercing Discarding Sabot round, extra range, and AP damage at the cost of 70% base damage dealt to armor.  Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Has 24 shots.
